```{r, message=F, warning=F}
both_tooth_yes=coronal_movement %>% filter(`Coronal_Movement_both_Teeth..y.n.`=="Y") %>% nrow()
both_tooth_all=coronal_movement %>% filter(`Coronal_Movement_both_Teeth..y.n.`=="Y" | `Coronal_Movement_both_Teeth..y.n.`=="N") %>% nrow()

both_tooth_yes/both_tooth_all

m_tooth_yes=coronal_movement %>% filter(M_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="Y") %>% nrow()
m_tooth_all=coronal_movement %>% filter(M_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="Y" | M_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="N") %>% nrow()

m_tooth_yes/m_tooth_all

d_tooth_yes=coronal_movement %>% filter(D_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="Y") %>% nrow()
d_tooth_all=coronal_movement %>% filter(D_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="Y" | D_Tooth_Coronal_Migration=="N") %>% nrow()

d_tooth_yes/d_tooth_all

```



* frequency: ` coronal_movement_both_teeth`: 3.17%; `M_tooth_coronal_migration`: 1.98%; `D_tooth_coronal_migration`: 1.59%. 





```{r, message=F, warning=F}
prop.test(x=c(both_tooth_yes, m_tooth_yes), n=c(both_tooth_all, m_tooth_all))

prop.test(x=c(both_tooth_yes, d_tooth_yes), n=c(both_tooth_all, d_tooth_all))

prop.test(x=c(m_tooth_yes, d_tooth_yes), n=c(m_tooth_all, d_tooth_all))
```






* `coronal_movement_both_teeth`  vs `M_tooth_coronal_migration`: p value 0.5741; 

* `coronal_movement_both_teeth`  vs `D_tooth_coronal_migration`: p value 0.3807;

* `M_tooth_coronal_migration`  vs `D_tooth_coronal_migration`: p value 1.000;


* in summary, all three are not different from one another. 

* two sample proportion test was used
